stimulusHtml: Which of the following disorders is most consistent with Grace's symptoms?

features.html: Grace is continually worried about her safety and overthinks solutions to all possible worst-case scenarios for events that havenâ€™t happened. Grace expresses concern to her family about whether they have enough emergency rations, smoke detectors, and batteries in the house just in case they need them. Grace is unable to set aside her worries and always feels restless and on edge.
